Strings of lights are also an inexpensive way to decorate for the holidays. You can use colored or simple white lights. Other types of garlands can look very attractive. Faux garlands of holly or other winter leaves can look pretty on holiday displays. Make sure when you are adding decorations that it enhances the look of your retail display, but that it does not get in the way of what the retail display is meant to do - display your products. Celebrate Everyone's Holidays An important factor to keep in mind about your holiday decorations is that you want to make sure your holiday decorations embrace everyone's idea of the holidays.
;
;Although retail store owners refer to the winter holiday season as "the Christmas season" - there is also Hanukah and Kwanza to consider. While some stores may wish to cater to a specific religion, such as a store with religious items or Christmas ornaments - other stores will want to be welcoming to other holidays and faiths. It simply makes good business sense to give good holiday greetings. Do your best to select holiday decorations for your retail displays that express your store's character - but also are expressive of other faiths and holidays. You'll be pleased with the results. Vinyl clings can also look attractive on retail displays. You can find winter and holiday themed vinyl clings that will look great on your retail displays. You simply peel off the package and stick them onto your display. Make sure the glass or plastic is clean before you stick them on. They will peel right off when you are ready to take them off. These can look very charming and come in so many styles.
;
;You can find vinyl clings in party supply stores and even in educational supply stores as many teachers and schools use them. Yet another beautiful means of enhancing your retail displays for the holiday is to spray faux holiday snow! This is regularly available at your local craft store and is not reserved only for indoor trees. The faux snow gives your displays an instant holiday aura, and when coupled with holiday lights, you have an amazing ambiance for selling! Dressing up your retail displays for the holidays is a great way to celebrate the holidays. It is fun and shows your holiday spirit. Celebrating the holidays also makes good business sense!
